price: и на њима Месец светлим дао, а Сунце светиљком учинио?!
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
